law.catch_line: Insurer not liable for amounts paid pursuant to KRS 304.20-210.
law.text: An insurer shall not be liable to any insured owner, mortgagee, assignee or other interested party for any amounts paid by it to the state or any county, city or other taxing district pursuant to the provisions of KRS 304.20-210 and in reliance upon information contained in any statement provided by the state or any county, city or other taxing district pursuant to KRS 304.20-210.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 278, sec. 4, effective July 15, 1980.
